synopsis.text: High school students Yumiko Satou, a struggling dubbing artist, and Chika Watanabe, an unpopular classmate, lead secret lives as radio co-hosts Yuuhi Yugure and Yasumi Utatane. Despite their contrasting personalities and mutual disdain, they must maintain a facade of friendship on their popular radio show, "Yuuhi and Yasumiâ€™s High School Radio". As their on-air chemistry captivates listeners, their off-air rivalry intensifies, leading to a rollercoaster journey of friendship, self-discovery, and the harsh realities of the entertainment industry. Can they overcome their differences and save their careers, or will their tumultuous relationship bring about their downfall?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
